amendment.description: Amendment allows custodial parents to participate in welfare-to-work programs equally with noncustodial parents.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 4 printed in H. Rept. 106-463 to remove the limit on Welfare to Work funds that can be used for employment-related services to custodial parents who are below the poverty level and who are not receiving assistance from the Temporary Assistance for Needy Families program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardin amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
